sentence.Network_en: She was instantly contrite. "Oh, I am sorry! You must forgive me."
sentence.Network_cn: 她马上就懊悔了。“哦，我很抱歉！你一定要原谅我。”
我尽量做出歉疚的样子.

sentence.Network_en: He was to be contrite and wish to be reconciled.
sentence.Network_cn: 他必须感到悔悟,并且希望得到赦免.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... contravene v. 违反，反驳，反对 contrite adj. 后悔的,痛悔的 contumacious adj. 不服从的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... trite 陈腐的，陈词滥调的 contrite 悔罪的，痛悔的 parasite 寄生虫，食客.

张红岩TOEFL ... contravene v. 反对，违反 contrite adj. 悔悟的 contrive v. 发明，设法.

list.abs: God gives the gospel to make contrite sinners confident of salvation and eternal life ., 神的福音使悔过的罪人对救恩与永生充满信心.
东帝汶East Timor表示悔意expressing contrition阻止抢掠bring the looting under control
his contrite tears moved his mother ., 他悔悟的眼泪感动了母亲.
contritelycontrition contrivance 器具装置contrive 发明设计创作图谋企图计谋筹谋策划设法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French contrit, from Latin contritus, past participle of conterere 'grind down, wear away', from con- 'together' + terere 'rub'

entry.tran: 深感懊悔的;痛悔的;悔悟的
entry.def: If you are contrite, you are very sorry because you have done something wrong.

example.ex: She was instantly contrite. 'Oh, I am sorry! You must forgive me.'
example.tran: 她马上就懊悔了。“哦，我很抱歉！你一定要原谅我。”

means.word_mean: 1. feeling or expressing pain or sorrow for sins or offenses
2. feeling regret for a fault or offence

auth_sentence.content: Keys himself struck me as neither contrite nor distressed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Keys himself struck me as neither contrite nor distressed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Keys himself struck me as neither contrite nor distressed.

auth_sentence.content: She was miserably contrite, saying that she had no excuse.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was miserably contrite, saying that she had no excuse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was miserably contrite, saying that she had no excuse.

auth_sentence.content: She was contrite and said she would never forge anything again.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was contrite and said she would never forge anything again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was contrite and said she would never forge anything again.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+trit磨擦+e→身心全部摩擦→悔恨交加的
attrit磨损的+ion表名词→n.消磨,磨损
de坏+tri=trit磨擦+ment表名词→磨坏了→损害
